title: East Bay man charged in alleged conspiracy to illegally ship powerful AI computer chips to China
description: Powerful Nvidia computer-processor chips have become highly prized amid a global race for supremacy in artificial intelligence.
content:
Federal authorities arrested an East Bay man over an alleged scheme to evade national security-related technology export controls and send powerful, highly sought after computer chips made by Santa Clara company Nvidia to China.

title: In less than 20 years none of us will be working at all thanks to artificial intelligence, says Elon Musk
description: The world's richest man said the decision to work will become like a hobby such as sport or growing your own vegetables.
content:
Working will become optional in just 20 years thanks to advances in artificial intelligence and robotics, Elon Musk has claimed.
The world’s richest man said the decision to work will become like a hobby such as sport or growing your own vegetables.

title: White House pauses executive order that would seek to preempt state laws on AI, sources say
description: (Reuters) -The White House has put on hold a draft executive order that would seek to preempt state laws on artificial intelligence through lawsuits and by withholding federal funds, two sources said on Friday.
content:
(Reuters) -The White House has put on hold a draft executive order that would seek to preempt state laws on artificial intelligence through lawsuits and by withholding federal funds, two sources said on Friday.

title: Country Singer Blanco Brown Proclaims A.I. Songs Have No Heart, Feeling
description: Artificial intelligence can put sound and lyrics together no problem ... but, it can't capture the heart of a human artist -- so says a country music star.
content:
TMZ.com
Artificial intelligence can put sound and lyrics together no problem ... but, it can't capture the heart of a human artist -- so says a country music star.

title: IRS Turns AI Agents Loose on Taxpayers
description: In three major divisions, the Internal Revenue Service has quietly begun using Salesforce's Agentforce artificial intelligence platform.
content:
The Internal Revenue Service has quietly begun using Salesforce's Agentforce artificial intelligence platform in three major divisions.

title: U.S. might let Nvidia sell H200 chips to China
description: The Trump administration is considering greenlighting sales of Nvidia’s H200 artificial intelligence chips to China, people familiar with the matter said, as a bilateral detente boosts prospects for exports of advanced U.S. technology to China.
content:
